Calculate entropy score

Source: R/calculate_entropy_and_similarity.R
calculate_entropy_and_similarity.Rd

This function applies similarity calculation to a list of spectra to obtain entropy scores

Usage

calculate_entropy_and_similarity(
  lib_ids,
  lib_precursors,
  lib_spectra,
  query_ids,
  query_precursors,
  query_spectra,
  method,
  dalton,
  ppm,
  threshold,
  approx
)

Arguments

lib_ids

Lib Ids

lib_precursors

Lib precursors

lib_spectra

Lib spectra

query_ids

Query Ids

query_precursors

Query precursors

query_spectra

Query spectra

method

Method

dalton

Dalton

ppm

Ppm

threshold

Threshold

approx

Approx

Examples

NULL
#> NULL
